firstNightReminder: Prompt the player to choose a player. Mark the chosen player with the Defendant token.
otherNightReminder: If they were mad that last night's player was evil, show them their character token. Prompt the player to choose a player. Mark the chosen player with the Defendant token.
name: Prosecutor
ability: Each night, choose a player. If you are mad that they are evil tomorrow, learn their character tomorrow night.

firstNightReminder: Wake the player and show them a number.
name: People Watcher
ability: You start knowing how many Outsiders are in play.

firstNightReminder: Wake the player and prompt them to choose a player. If a good player is chosen, mark them with the Drunk token. If an evil player is chosen, tell them who the Bartender is.
name: Bartender
ability: Each night, choose a player: they become drunk until dusk if they are good and they learn who you are if they are evil.

firstNightReminder: Wake the player and prompt them to choose a player. Mark the chosen player with the Recluse token.
otherNightReminder: Remove the existing Recluse token. Wake the player and prompt them to choose a player. Mark the chosen player with the Recluse token.
name: Slanderer
ability: Each night, choose a player: they might register as Evil and as a Demon or Minion until Dusk.

name: Socialite
ability: You might register as Good and as a Townsfolk or Outsider. Your good neighbors might register as Evil and as a Demon or Minion.

firstNightReminder: Mark a Townsfolk with the Poisoned reminder token.
name: Twisted Reflection
ability: You have the ability of an in-play Townsfolk. That Townsfolk's player is poisoned.

firstNightReminder: Wake the player and see if they want to use their ability.
otherNightReminder: Wake the player and see if they want to use their ability.
name: Reveler
ability: Once per game at night, you may make all players poisoned until dusk tomorrow.

name: Double Agent
ability: If you were mad that the Demon is the Demon today, they can't die until dusk.

name: Siryn
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. On the first night, choose a player: they are evil.

name: Syren
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. [1 Townsfolk is evil]

name: Imaginox
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Players who are mad that the Imoginox is in play might be executed.
